page.title: 16Hospitals.
page.content: Close to where we live there is a Hospice. It is called St.Anne's Hospice. People who are very ill are cared for by the Nurses. Inside the Hospice it is light and cheerful with flowers and pretty curtains. Everyone is very happy there and the Matron and Nurses all enjoy their work. The Hospice always needs money so everytime we hold an event like a Christmas Concert, we have a collection for them. Everybody in Heald Green is very proud of the work done at St.Anne's and everyone always gives to this charity. There is also another Hospital called Cheadle Royal. The patients there are quite fit in their bodies but are feeling depressed or confused in their minds. Some of the patients stay in wards and others are Outpatients.It is quite a large Hospital with its own Church.
